title: Album Page, "Elevation of Opening Framed by Columns and Supported on Paneled Base", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper with deckled edge tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, left of drawing: project 02; bottom right of drawing: bench (?). Verso, in graphite, upper right corner: 118; lower right corner: 111.
dimensions: Sheet: 31.3 x 21.1 cm (12 5/16 x 8 5/16 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet with upper half of sheet depicting a sparsely sketched elevation of an opening spanned by a lintel supported by two columns on top of a base with a rectangular panel.  Some elements of the composition have inscribed dimensions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Elevation of Opening Framed by Columns and Supported on Paneled Base", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on off-white wove paper with deckled edge tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-283.
